content: {"name": "NEXT STEP COMMUNITY CHURCH", "alternate_name": "", "description": "-https://www.facebook.com/NEXTSTEPCC.ORG/", "email": "", "url": "https://nextstepcc.org/what-we-do/#pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "360 Schermerhorn Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Boerum Hill", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11217", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6865313, "longitude": -73.9803445}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 875-1858", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Client choice pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers available (must bring birth certificate)"}]}
